alert.note: Alert for Gallia (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 08 at 10:08PM EDT until May 10 at 11:25AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Ohio... West Virginia... Ohio River At Point Pleasant affecting Gallia and Mason Counties. For the Ohio River...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River At Point Pleasant. * WHEN...Until late Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 42.0 feet, The Little Kyger Road in Ohio is flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 PM EDT Sunday the stage was 40.9 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:00 PM EDT Sunday was 40.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 42.0 feet early Monday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 40.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 42.1 feet on 04/18/2018. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/rlx. The next statement will be issued Monday morning at 1015 AM EDT.
